channel.title: Special tutorial error
channel.description:
i followed delta's special tut and got 1 error......
[code]client.java:9384: orphaned case case 29113://bows ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
plz sum1 help

item.title: Special tutorial error
item.dc:creator: @CChhrriiss CChhrriiss
item.description:
@CChhrriiss wrote:

Where it says

case
^
The ^ arrow is telling you where the error is, So the error must be The “C” or Case. Just for further knowledge

Read full topic

item.title: Special tutorial error
item.dc:creator: @fallen_darkness fallen darkness
item.description:
@fallen_darkness wrote:

[quote=“ZZZpk, post:2, topic:184915”]Search for this

case 185:

U should see this

case 185: // clicking most buttons actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize); if (!validClient) break; if (!antiHax()) break; resetAction(); println("ab=" + actionButtonId); if (duelButton(actionButtonId)) { break; } switch (actionButtonId) {

Under the switch (actionbuttoniD) add this:

case 29113://bows case 33033://halberds case 29163://swords case 29138://dds case 48023://whip try { if (specOn == true) { specOn = false; } else if (specOn == false) { specOn = true; } specAttack(); } catch (Exception popo) { } break;

Remove ur OLD code.[/quote]tyvm it worked!

Read full topic

item.title: Special tutorial error
item.dc:creator: @ZZZpk ZZZpk
item.description:
@ZZZpk wrote:

Search for this

case 185:

U should see this

case 185: // clicking most buttons actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize); if (!validClient) break; if (!antiHax()) break; resetAction(); println("ab=" + actionButtonId); if (duelButton(actionButtonId)) { break; } switch (actionButtonId) {

Under the switch (actionbuttoniD) add this:

case 29113://bows case 33033://halberds case 29163://swords case 29138://dds case 48023://whip try { if (specOn == true) { specOn = false; } else if (specOn == false) { specOn = true; } specAttack(); } catch (Exception popo) { } break;

Remove ur OLD code.
